Hospital.Controllers

Class LoginController<T extends Staff>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Controllers.LoginController<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of user, must be a child of the Staff-class (Doctor,Nurse,...) This controller enables the following usecases: Login: the existence of this controller represnets the logged in state All others: check if the person is still logged in
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdministratorController, DoctorController, NurseController, WareHouseController

    public abstract class LoginController<T extends Staff>
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller is created when a user logs in and will represent this user for the duration of his/her session.
